com.apigee.sdk
Class ApigeeClient

java.lang.Object
  com.apigee.sdk.ApigeeClient

public class ApigeeClient
extends java.lang.Object

The ApigeeClient serves as the entry point for initializing the Apigee client SDK. See our SDK install guide for more information.

Author:
ApigeeCorporation
See Also:
Apigee SDK install guide

ApigeeClient

public ApigeeClient(java.lang.String organizationId,
                    java.lang.String applicationId,
                    java.lang.String baseURL,
                    MonitoringOptions monitoringOptions,
                    Context context)
Instantiate client for a specific app, with an alternative baseURL for requests and options for App Monitoring.

Parameters:
organizationId - the organization id or name
applicationId - the application id or name
baseURL - the base URL to use for server communications
monitoringOptions - the options for application monitoring
context - the Android context
